data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Can Brestois get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nantes's half?
In the minute 1, Brestois to take a throw-in in Nantes territory.
Nantes's Marcus Coco attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Brestois at Stade de la Beaujoire.
In the minute 3, Brestois's Romain Philippoteaux misses with an attempt on goal.
Jeremie Pignard awards Nantes a goal kick.
Free kick for Nantes in their own half.
In the minute 5, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Nantes in Nantes.
Throw-in for Brestois in the half of Nantes.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Nantes at Stade de la Beaujoire.
Jeremie Pignard signals a Brestois throw-in in Nantes's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Nantes goal kick.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Brestois in their own half.
Brestois have been awarded a corner by Jeremie Pignard.
Throw-in for Brestois in the half of Nantes.
In the minute 10, In Nantes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Romain Perraud for Brestois drives towards goal at Stade de la Beaujoire. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Jeremie Pignard signals a free kick to Nantes in their own half.
In the minute 12, Brestois awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Steve Mounie (Brestois) strikes at Stade de la Beaujoire but his header is cleared.
In the minute 14, Nantes to take a throw-in in Brestois territory.
Randal Kolo Muani is on target to give Nantes a 1-0 advantage.
Great play from Marcus Coco to set up the goal.
In the minute 17, Throw-in Nantes.
Jeremie Pignard signals a Brestois throw-in in Nantes's half.
At Stade de la Beaujoire, Brestois are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 19, Jeremie Pignard signals a throw-in for Nantes, close to Brestois's area.
Brestois awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Brestois.
In the minute 21, Nantes have a goal kick.
Nantes advance rapidly upfield but Jeremie Pignard blows for offside.
Jeremie Pignard awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 25, Jeremie Pignard signals a free kick to Brestois.
In Nantes Brestois drive forward through Romain Perraud. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick Brestois.
In the minute 27, Brestois's Hugo Magnetti breaks free at Stade de la Beaujoire. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nantes.
Ball safe as Nantes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 29, Brestois have a goal kick.
Jeremie Pignard signals a free kick to Brestois in their own half.
Goal! Ludovic Blas extends Nantes's lead to 2-0.
In the minute 32, In Nantes Brestois attack through Hugo Magnetti. The finish is off target, however.
Jeremie Pignard awards Nantes a goal kick.
Can Brestois get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nantes's half?
In the minute 34, Free kick for Nantes in the half of Brestois.
Nantes are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Nantes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 36, Jeremie Pignard signals a Brestois throw-in in Nantes's half.
Nantes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Brestois.
In the minute 38, Mehdi Abeid (Nantes) has received a yellow card from Jeremie Pignard.
Brestois have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Brestois.
In the minute 41, Free kick for Nantes in their own half.
Throw-in for Brestois in their own half.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Nantes in the half of Brestois.
Throw-in Brestois.
Free kick for Nantes in the half of Brestois.
Jean-Kevin Duverne (Brestois) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 44, Nantes have been awarded a corner by Jeremie Pignard.
Fabio (Nantes) shoots â€“ and rattles the crossbar!
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nantes.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Nantes at Stade de la Beaujoire.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Nantes.
Nantes are caught offside.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Stade de la Beaujoire.
The second-half is underway in Nantes.
Throw-in for Nantes at Stade de la Beaujoire.
Oliver Dall'Oglio is making the team's first substitution at Stade de la Beaujoire with Jeremy Le Douaron replacing Gaetan Charbonnier.
In the minute 46, Nantes make their first substitution with Abdoulaye Toure replacing Pedro Chirivella.
Irvin Cardona is replacing Romain Philippoteaux for Brestois at Stade de la Beaujoire.
In the minute 47, In Nantes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Fabio is booked for the home team.
Ball goes out of play for a Nantes goal kick.
In the minute 48, Jeremie Pignard signals a free kick to Nantes.
Jeremie Pignard signals a free kick to Brestois in their own half.
In Nantes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 52, Romain Faivre gets his shot on target but fails to score for Brestois.
Can Brestois get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nantes's half?
Nantes to take a throw-in in Brestois territory.
In the minute 54, Free kick for Nantes in the half of Brestois.
Can Nantes capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Brestois's half?
Free kick in a good position for Nantes!
In the minute 57, Ludovic Blas for Nantes gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Nantes drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Brestois's Romain Perraud gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 58, Ball goes out of play for a Nantes goal kick.
Ball safe as Nantes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 60, Jeremie Pignard awards the away team a throw-in.
In Nantes Brestois attack through Romain Perraud. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nantes.
At Stade de la Beaujoire, Hugo Magnetti has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 61, Nantes's Randal Kolo Muani is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Nantes.
In Nantes, Nantes push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 63, The home team have replaced Marcus Coco with Moses Simon. This is the second substitution made today by Christian Gourcuff.
Brestois have been awarded a corner by Jeremie Pignard.
Nantes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 65, Nantes are whistled for offside.
Free kick for Nantes in their own half.
Brestois drive forward but Ludovic Baal is judged offside.
In the minute 67, Nantes will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Brestois.
Nantes's Nicolas Pallois has been booked in Nantes.
Goal! Romain Faivre pulls one back to make it 2-1.
In the minute 69, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Brestois in their own half.
Oliver Dall'Oglio (Brestois) is making a third substitution, with Franck Honorat replacing Hugo Magnetti.
In the minute 71, Julien Faussurier is replacing Ludovic Baal for the away team.
Steve Mounie for Brestois gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Nantes have a goal kick.
In the minute 73, Can Brestois get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nantes's half?
Jeremie Pignard awards the away team a throw-in.
Nantes needs to be cautious. Brestois have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 74, Jeremie Pignard awards Nantes a goal kick.
Throw-in for Brestois in their own half.
Throw-in Nantes.
In the minute 76, Jeremie Pignard signals a free kick to Nantes.
Brestois awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The home team have replaced Imran Louza with Abdoul Kader Bamba. This is the third substitution made today by Christian Gourcuff.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Brestois close to the penalty box.
Brestois are whistled for offside.
It's now 3-1 in Nantes as Abdoul Kader Bamba scores for Nantes.
In the minute 79, Moses Simon instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick Nantes.
Jeremie Pignard signals a free kick to Brestois in their own half.
In the minute 84, Irvin Cardona (Brestois) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Brestois.
Steve Mounie (Brestois) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In the minute 84, Brestois have been awarded a corner by Jeremie Pignard.
Brestois surge into the attack at Stade de la Beaujoire but Steve Mounieâ€™s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Nantes at Stade de la Beaujoire.
Brestois to take a throw-in in Nantes territory.
In the minute 85, Oliver Dall'Oglio is making the team's fifth substitution at Stade de la Beaujoire with Heriberto Tavares replacing Steve Mounie.
Brestois awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 87, Jeremie Pignard signals a free kick to Nantes.
Throw-in for Brestois at Stade de la Beaujoire.
Nantes pushes forward through Moses Simon, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 88, Free kick Nantes.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Nantes are on the attack at Stade de la Beaujoire, where Mehdi Abeid is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
Nantes's Mehdi Abeid gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Brestois defender.
In Nantes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Brestois in the half of Nantes.
It's 3-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
